derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent. (originally in sense 2, early crinolines being made of such material): from French, formed irregularly from Latin crinis 'hair' + linum 'thread'

entry.def: A crinoline was a round frame which women wore under their skirts in the 19th century.
